body.name: Storage Cabinet with Doors, Modern Black Accent Cabinet, Free Standing Cabinet, Wooden Buffet Sideboards for Bedroom, Kitchen,Home Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 38 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 【Sturdy Construction】The storage sideboard is made of solid 15MM MDF wood for a long-lasting construction, strong enough to stand the microwaves, mixers, blenders and coffee machines. Waterproof surface, great coating with moisture resistance. And also with metal soft hinges and polished gold handles,making this cabinet scratch-resistant and wear-resistant. Metal legs separates the wood from the ground to prevent moisture.

【Wood Storage Cabinet】This black accent cabinet with simple design is suitable with all living styles and with kinds of home decoration,creating a modern as well as elegant feeling, adding the beauty to your home.Overall Dimensions: 31"(L) x 16"(D) x 31"(H).

【Multifunctional Cabinet】This black cabinet can be a sideboard buffet storage cabinet in dining room or living room, and also can be used as a console table for home office, functions as a storage cabinet for books, shoes, bags and small decors. 2 cabinets even can functions as a sturdy TV standing in bedroom or living room. It can enhance a variety of spaces in your house or office.

【Modern Sideboard】This buffet sideboard have 2 large storage space.Inside it there is 2 story structure, the middle shelf has 45 lbs capacity, while the bottom shelf has 65 lbs capacity. You can put books, clothes, toys and any other things in this wooden cabinet, making your house more organized.Total capacity: 210lbs.

【Quick Sales Service】This wood cabinet package comes with tools that needed to install and clear step-to-step instructions.(method to adjust hinges to make no gap in doors is STEP11 in the instructions) Please contact us if any problems or questions and we will give quick and detailed response and solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this cabinet. Arrived in great shape, all parts and instructions were included. I only needed a flat and Phillips screwdriver. Assembly of the cabinets was easy, but it required another person to assist with attaching the doors. The information added to the instructions for adjusting the placement of the doors was very helpful. Reviewers of similar products complained of a toxic odor, which is why I did not by theirs. This product had no odor. It is very well made, sturdy, attractive, and will service our needs well for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Don't Put Stuff Together
reviews.reviewText: This is a review of REHOOPEX Set of 2 Black Side Storage Cabinet.I have no idea what came over me that I decided I would tackle putting this together by myself. I am the person who will call Task Rabbit in a heartbeat to put stuff together.Boy, am I so glad I decided to give it a shot. I feel so accomplished now. I bought the 2-pack of these and put both of them together all by myself! If you are like me, I suggest you give it a try, it really isn't that hard....really! If you are used to putting stuff together, this will be a breeze. It took about an hour to put the first one together and maybe 35 minutes to put the second one together using power tools.For newbs like me, here are a few hints to help you out.1. Lay out all of your pieces so you know exactly what you have. All of the pieces and hardware are labeled perfectly.2. When you get to step 2 be aware of the orientation of the board. This will be your middle shelf. I wasn't fully aware and wound up with the shelf upside down (where the screws show on top) on the first one I put together. I got it right on the second one. Maybe one day I'll take the first one apart and flip it over - or maybe not since you can't tell once the shelf is filled with stuff.3. Use a power tool to put it together. I was done in no time with an electric screwdriver. It would've taken forever with a manual screwdriver. You will get an allen wrench for some of the screws as well.4. In order to not drive myself nuts, when attaching the hinges to the sideboard by myself, I actually turned the unit on its side which made it a breeze to drill the hinge screws into place.5. If you still aren't sure you can do it, just ask the seller to send you the directions before purchasing so you can see exactly what it entails. That is what I am doing for other items I am purchasing now.I wanted different handles than what comes with it. I read another review where the person gave the measurements to look for (7-9/16 192mm center to center). I found these on Amazon, on sale for $10 each (B09L5C16WC). They come in various finishes. If you decide to get these, here's a little tip: the handles come with 2 sizes of screws. Use the shorter ones with this unit. You're welcome :).I still have to tweak the doors a bit to get them lined up to my exacting look, but I got them close on my first try and it doesn't look too bad right now.I am super happy with the purchase. The price for two was reasonable, everything came in perfect condition, it looks just as described, and was easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful cabinet for price point.
reviews.reviewText: We bought this cabinet to store homemade tinctures, teas, and medicine. It works perfectly for what we needed.It is sold as a smaller floor cabinet but we bought it to put on our countertop in our kitchen. It was perfect for our space.It was simple to put together but having two people helps. One side of the cabinet had holes that didn’t line up perfectly and caused the door to drag a little when opening but we were able to fix it.Overall, I’m very pleased with this little cabinet with glass doors. It made a very functional addition to our home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp Modern Appearance
reviews.reviewText: Looks great in my dining room. Ample storage. Easy to assemble, sturdy. When the doors are closed there is a gap between the two doors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love the cabinets (ordered two). I bought them for my Santas. They are perfect for our living room and the perfect color. They are as advertised and the price is perfect. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Garbage material and doors don’t align properly
reviews.reviewText: Arrived with a knick out of the corner of the top part. After far too long of trying to align the doors so there weren’t any gaps, my engineer husband, had to give up. The factory that manufactured this cabinet did a very poor job. The legs and door handles look cool though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this cabinet and I was pleasantly surprised by the quality. I’m always a little nervous buying furniture online because too often it turns out to be very thin particle board with cheap hardware. So I was thrilled that this was actually sturdy with quality materials. It looks great! The doors have better hinges than any other cabinets I’ve bought in this price range, so they open and close quietly and sit level. Very pleased!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the time commitment?
reviews.reviewText: So this package can be a bit heavy, so if you’re not a strong person, it may take two to get this product home. I had to pick mine up from the post office, because Amazon will not deliver to my home address anymore. There are a lot of different pieces and you have to be very careful about how you put them together and also be ready for a big time commitment, I am not used to putting that many pieces together and they did not all fit well especially not the smaller screws. Be prepared to be very patient with the little bitty holes that they made to screw the screws into. You can trust the instructions, they are pretty good, and easy to follow for the most part. Now that everything‘s put together it looks really good as my drink cabinet.
